website_summaries.verdict: A classic Megatron that transforms into a tank and has the attention to detail and durability to make it a top pick.
pros: Incredible face detail is close to the original cartoon
Working rubber treads on the tank
Accessory storage when in tank mode
cons: Doesn't roll well in tank mode

customer_reviews.title: He's a BIG boy
customer_reviews.text: I think Megatron is my first leader class purchase, and I was not expecting him to be so big. He's about an inch or so shorter than combiner wars Bruticus (no upgrade kits) and looks amazing. The shoulder articulation can be an issue for some, but not to me. Almost all his joints are on ratchets, so loose joints are not a problem. I am extremely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cheesy

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Megatron on the market for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seeing this Megatron is one thing but holding and feling it is another. This is an extremely well made Transformer. You can't beat it for $46.00! I thought about buying it for 2 years. I juggled with the idea of buying the much more expensive third party Megatrons but honestly, unless you are hell bent on being a G1 purist, there is no point in buying a $200.00 dollar item when you can have this.
customer_reviews.author: Bran.B

customer_reviews.title: A breath of fresh megatron.
customer_reviews.text: I like this one i was tired of megatron always being a gun which no sound wave nor starscream can hold lol. But its refreshing to have a G1 look but a different form i hoe the make an oversize KO of this one to match my MPP10 Prime. But it does scale to my MP10 prime.
customer_reviews.author: Charisse Selga

customer_reviews.title: Megatron is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old for Christmas and he absolutely loves it! It's sturdy construction and he's even learned how to transform this bad boy by himself. This is the best looking Megatron that I have seen!
customer_reviews.author: Violoso

customer_reviews.title: Five star all the way
customer_reviews.text: One of the best megatron versions. This is a great gift for kids and collectors. Worth your money. What you see is what you get. Robot actual size is 9 inches tall from head to toe.
customer_reviews.author: Eheads4ever

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful update of a classic Decepticon Leader
customer_reviews.text: An amazing new incarnation of the classic Decepticon leader. While this version transforms into a tank instead of a blaster like his G1 counterpart, he has many details that are inspired by the original 1984 Megatron. The figure is big, imposing looking and fun to transform. This figure belongs in the collection of any Transformers fan! Check out my detailed review and gallery of this figure at:
customer_reviews.author: Benson

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is one sweet figure. What really gets me is the mold and color scheme. The only thing I don't like are the red shoulders, but oh well, you can't have everything. This thing looks incredible in either robot or tank mode. The transformation is also enjoyable, and I don't normally particularly enjoy doing transformations, but I've already done it numerous times with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't for sellers like you, people like me would never finish our collections. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my Transformers Combiner Wars Megatron. He looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Brady Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great figure!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best megatrons there is, alt mode is super great!!
customer_reviews.author: MVshaolin

customer_reviews.title: and this one is my favorite. I love how good both forms look
customer_reviews.text: I have at least 5 megatrons, and this one is my favorite. I love how good both forms look, and how quick it is to transform
customer_reviews.author: Vard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, maybe the best Megatron ever
customer_reviews.text: Possible the perfect Megatron. I think Masterpiece and the rare gun colored classics give this incarnation a run for their money, 100% poseable and in good scale. Love posing him about to kill Ironhide
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he is the best version of the G1 cartoon Megatron that I have ...
customer_reviews.text: even though he is a tank, he is the best version of the G1 cartoon Megatron that I have ever seen (at less than $70). And he is shiny so he has that nostalgic look like when he was a pistol (except he looks like the cartoon Megatron).
customer_reviews.author: tony sunday

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with packaging and product. It was for my brothers birthday and he loved the size and detail!
customer_reviews.author: John Jackson

customer_reviews.title: It's one of the those best made G1 figures (although it transform into a tank ...
customer_reviews.text: A little pricy but worth the price. It's one of the those best made G1 figures (although it transform into a tank instead a giant pistol).
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the coolest Megatrons made (with the exception of the Master Piece line).
customer_reviews.author: geomic

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Megatron figures ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Megatron figures ever. The transformation is intuitive yet simple and just plain fun. Also the real working tank treads are just plain cool.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Ann Kawa

customer_reviews.title: PEACE THROUGH TYRANNY.... YESSSS
customer_reviews.text: Great figure! Majestic and imposing, Megatron takes no scrap from anybot! This toy evokes a lot of nostalgia for me, even though it isn't a pistol like the original. There are quite a few interesting gimmicks and features here, such as light-piped eyes (which I always like even though I don't have a display which utilizes them) and a great head mold. My only complaint is that this toy, like Ultra Magnus, is part of the "Combiner Wars" line but has NO combining function outside of fanmods. In the comics, he ALMOST fuses with the Constructicons... Overall, I recommend this figure for any adult collector as it may be tedious for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: David Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you could ask for in a Megatron figure. Working (rubber) treads on an appropriate alt-mode update, very imposing, and tons of silver paint. Seriously, most of this guy is covered in silver paint. He's practically on par with the takara release. There's even weapon storage under the tank mode. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazingtBrave

customer_reviews.title: Pretty large figure for a leader class
customer_reviews.text: Pretty large figure for a leader class. Has more details in the paint schemes than it's takara counterpart. Highly detailed sculpt with tight joints.
customer_reviews.author: around n around

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great transformation! I love everything about this figure, it's the best transformer I have.
customer_reviews.author: Astarot

customer_reviews.title: MEGATRON LIVES!!!
customer_reviews.text: Being an avid fan of the Transformers franchise for practically most of my life, I definitely don't shy away from collecting awesome toys, even at my age! This version of Megatron is awesome. The overall look is pretty authentic to the original, even though the original was a gun and this is a tank. Nonetheless, the features, and attention to detail are very meticulous. Probably one of the nicer looking figures and I'm really excited about some of the other Combiner series figures that are coming.
customer_reviews.author: randstarr

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome.  A must buy for any fan of the classic character design.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best of the series and an honor to a classic character. Great construction, very solid build. REAL rubber working tank treads!!!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very nice G1 like figure for my Transformer collection.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made action figure. Bought it for my son. It’s his favorite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All hail megatron!
customer_reviews.text: I love megatron. After Michael Bay created utter garbage, I'm glad Hasbro is re-re-re-introducing generations combiner wars. Now obviously Megatron is not a silver tank originally but this version of him being a tank makes him look like the gun by make it all silver. The figure itself has more posable joints and is solid. Doesn't feel like rubbery cheap plastic. Instead it's light but has lots of cool details. I would recommend this in robot mode for display. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Control Room 2020

customer_reviews.title: Figure is good but the paint isn't as shiny or as nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Figure is good but the paint isn't as shiny or as nice as the figure that's pictured. Still a great looking Megatron.
customer_reviews.author: joshua thor

customer_reviews.title: Transformers Generations Combiner Wars Megatron
customer_reviews.text: Nice homage to the throwback Megatron of the 80s even though he doesn't transform into a hand gun. Still, very highly detailed.
customer_reviews.author: alpal76

customer_reviews.title: but he looks great in both modes
customer_reviews.text: I kind of wish the transformation was more complex, but he looks great in both modes.
customer_reviews.author: bjjjcr

customer_reviews.title: Megatron Rules!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves Megatron. Could not go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I finally have this
customer_reviews.text: This figure is awesome. My girlfriend got it for me. Decent posablity. Inspired from IDW comics. Easy transformation.
customer_reviews.author: David Losse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toy and homage to the Ruler of the Decepticons. ALL HAIL MEGATRON!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Beisler

customer_reviews.title: More of a display piece.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon actually got the package to me faster than I ever expected it to. The Figure itself is actually really awesome when displayed. It is one great looking Megatron. The one real issue with it however is the weak shoulder joints. I had to return one I purchased from a difference source after it's arm came off when removed from the packaging. Though being a toy I would say this Megatron is better suited for collectors and display purposes rather than to be played with.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome Megatron toy
customer_reviews.text: ALL HAIL MEGATRON! This is an awesome Megatron toy, closely resembling his G1 incarnation in robot mode (and becoming a kick-tailgate tank in vehicle mode). Megatron is large and in charge, ready to smash your Autobots into slag... unless Prime stops him, of course! You will not regret buying this well- articulated and pose able figure, with great metallic look. Face looks just like you remember. Please note, however, that despite being a "combiner wars" toy, Megatron doesn't actually combine with anything, unlike the slightly smaller combiner wars Optimus Prime. That said, you must have this figure!
customer_reviews.author: Anime Fan

customer_reviews.title: Megatron Returns
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece, only downside was the stickers really, didn't bother with them as they came on clear white backing and not transparent. Excellent none the less!
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: ALL HAIL MEGATRON!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy giving Megatron the classic 80's look. ALL HAIL MEGATRON!
customer_reviews.author: Edward VanMacho

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Order came in as expected and delivered exactly on time.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing figure! Great representation of his original G1 image
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing figure! Great representation of his original G1 image. Many details and high quality feeling. Highly recommended to anyone that loves G1 figures.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Generations leader class megatron
customer_reviews.text: The best megatron ever made, excellent G1 look, at last a proper tank alt-mode. Plus thanks Amazon once again a for great service
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome figure and shipped from US to UK via amazon with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the Megatron I have always been waiting for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Combiner Wars Megatron - Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great figure. It is well built, easy yet fun to transform and has a classic G1 look in robot mode. There is also a third unofficial gun mode which is awesome. Check out my Review here:
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B.

customer_reviews.title: It is not perfect, but is is the best G1 Megatron ever ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not perfect, but is is the best G1 Megatron ever created by Hasbro. Knee and hip articulations are a little limited, but arms, waist and head joints are fully articulated. The best feature of this figure is the fact that it perfectly resembles G1 Megatron, specifically its head, chest and waist. It is big enough, so it can fit very well in a masterpiece shelf, and looks cooler on a generations shelf. I have to say that this Megatron is a must-have for any transformers collector.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Chinchilla Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: good articulation and detail
customer_reviews.text: Very solid figure, good articulation and detail, although, a bit boring. His transformation is barely 10 full steps, and most all of that is just mirrored from one side to the other. Certainly not a bad figure, and a great addition to your collection, just a bit bland really.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Strait

customer_reviews.title: A gorgeous figure, but looks out of place with the other Combiner Wars bots.
customer_reviews.text: This figure is absolutely gorgeous and isn't too difficult to transform, there's really nothing positive I can say about Megatron that hasn't already been said in the other reviews. I do want to point out though that there is a pretty big height difference between him and Optimus Prime which bothers me, I think the two should've either both been Leader Class or Voyager Class so they "match". Other than that, I can't really say anything negative about this figure, but for me that's enough to only be able to give our friend here 4 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Collier

customer_reviews.title: One of the best first party Megatron figures in recent history
customer_reviews.text: There is a genuine reason that the collector community went nuts for these when they were first announced. This guy is awesome. He makes Armada Megatron look like a total wimp.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Figure! Although the seller shipped it a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Figure! Although the seller shipped it a little bit late, but that doesn't matter anymore! I'm pleased that this figure came in excellent condition! The articulations are responsive and just outright fun to pose it! This figure is an absolute nod to how Megatron looked in the G1 cartoon series, even though his alt mode is a tank rather than his iconic gun mode, but I don't mind it! I can't to get Optimus Prime from the Power of the Primes line to pair up with (or against) the Leader of the Decepticons himself! All Hail Megatron!
customer_reviews.author: Hector L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Megatron!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best Megatron we will get that's not custom, nice Transformation, good feel, and solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nabinger

customer_reviews.title: A great figure, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: A great mix between, G1 and MTMTE, a sturdy figure, a great looking alt mode and a mean looking Megs, could've used more ratcheting points, but other than that, a near perfect representation of the decepcticon commander.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Must have for fans and collectors alike.
customer_reviews.text: This re-imagination of Megatron definitely harkens back to g1 Megatron, as another reviewer has already noted. The figure is easy to transform and he looks great in both tank mode and robot mode. He has articulation in the hips, waist, wrist, elbows, shoulders, and his head so he is very posable. The decal set includes both decepticon and autobot insignias so you can choose which faction he is part of. In the IDW comics, Megatron becomes an autobot by the time the Combiner Wars happen. Who knows, maybe he'll return to his old decepticon ways down the road, but for children of the 80's, like me, he'll always be a decepticon. This is a must-have for fans and collectors alike.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: New school with an old school feel.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome figure that really harkens back to the old school Megatron of old. Easy transformation and it looks awesome both in robot and tank form. Highly recommend it if you liked the old school megatron fan or just a Transformers fan in general. Cant go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: HydraG2

customer_reviews.title: I chose this instead of a Masterpiece Megatron
customer_reviews.text: I always hated the fact that Megatron was a pistol. Of all the things they could have chosen, a small pistol!? Now, a tank... that's much better. The other reason I passed on the Masterpiece Megatron is that it's so damn ugly compared to the Masterpiece Prime. This one actually gives it a run for its money! It's not perfect, of course. It's very light, the legs are not very stable and the articulation is poor, to say the least. But it looks so good I can't go lower than 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother if you want it to roll nice
customer_reviews.text: This transformer is pretty nice but for a 5 yr old who likes toy that roll, the tank mode of this transformer is terrible because it doesnt roll well. Maybe I got a dud but the treads, although look nice and realistic, dont roll smooth and will often fall out of place. Better as a display piece. If your kid plans to roll it around in tank mode, dont get this.
customer_reviews.author: Opinion Nobody Asked You To Agree With

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money I would not buy any more of these toys
customer_reviews.author: David Brusch

customer_reviews.title: Great figure!
customer_reviews.text: Great figure!! could not be more pleased with it. highly recommend it if your a g1 transformers fan. jump on it quick for $46.99
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: This is more difficult than it looks. We have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is more difficult than it looks. We have not quite figured out how to transform it. Still working on it.
customer_reviews.author: M Sawatzky

customer_reviews.title: $46.99 retail
customer_reviews.text: $46.99 Retail. This is an awesome rendition of Megatron! His transformation is not overly complex. I would recommend this figure as well as recommend looking for him at retail price. The scalping going on at amazon here is getting a bit out of hand.
customer_reviews.author: BigBot3031

customer_reviews.title: The figure is awesome, but the silver paint comes of very easily
customer_reviews.text: The figure is awesome, but the silver paint comes of very easily. Two transformations and the knee joints are already looking as if it had been bought years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Miroslaw A. Miernik

product_meta.title: TRANSFORMERS Generations Combiner Wars - MEGATRON Figure
product_meta.description: There was a time when the name of Megatron was honored by many across Cybertron. But power inevitably corrupts, and none are so powerful as mighty Megatron. Long ago, he forgot he was a hero, and became nothing more than a tyrant. The war he launched eventually drained his home planet of life. Not even the death of a world could sate his hunger for conquest. The war between Autobot and Decepticon rages on, and with Megatron leading the Decepticons, the action gets more intense all the time! This awesome Megatron figure is a massive force for evil in robot mode with an enormous blaster that will pummel any unsuspecting Autobot. But when it's time for some truly massive firepower, he converts to an enormous tank with a missile launcher! Get ready for a whole new generation of Transformers mayhem with this incredible Megatron figure! Transformers and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Includes figure, collector card and instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars163 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
